member.summary: Defines the logic for a template wizard extension.

The list of standard parameters to be replaced.
A indicating the type of wizard run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.IWizard.ShouldAddProjectItem(System.String)

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.TemplateWizardDisallowUserTemplatesSecurityAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the template wizard extension will only load templates located in the Visual Studio installation directory or one of its subdirectories.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.TemplateWizardDisallowUserTemplatesSecurityAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies that the template wizard extension will only load templates located in the Visual Studio installation directory or one of its subdirectories.
member.param: true to specify that the template wizard extension will only load templates located in the Visual Studio installation directory or one of its subdirectories; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.TemplateWizardDisallowUserTemplatesSecurityAttribute.DisallowUserTemplates
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether to disallow user templates.
member.returns: true to disallow user templates; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.TemplateWizardSecurityAttribute

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.TemplateWizardSecurityAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies that the template wizard extension will only run when called by the specified template.
member.param: The name of the template allowed to call the template wizard extension. For example, MyTemplate.vstemplate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.TemplateWizardSecurityAttribute.CallingTemplate
member.summary: Gets the name of the template allowed to call the template wizard extension.
member.returns: The name of the template allowed to call the template wizard extension.
